name: Jamal HATCHER, Petitioner v. COURT OF COMMON PLEAS PHILADELPHIA COUNTY, Respondent
name_abbreviation: Hatcher v. Court of Common Pleas

parties: Jamal HATCHER, Petitioner v. COURT OF COMMON PLEAS PHILADELPHIA COUNTY, Respondent.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 21st day of November, 2014, the Application for Leave to File Original Process and the Petition for Writ of Mandamus are DISMISSED as improper attempts at hybrid representation. See Commonwealth v. Ali, 608 Pa. 71, 10 A.3d 282 (2010). The Prothonotary is DIRECTED to forward the filings to counsel of record.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
104 A.3d 1155
Jamal HATCHER, Petitioner v. COURT OF COMMON PLEAS PHILADELPHIA COUNTY, Respondent.
No. 157 EM 2014.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Nov. 21, 2014.
